response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its exceptional value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to valued individuals like yourself, aiming to provide an opportunity to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and requirements. I look forward to the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 14000}
